name: Project Bounce (worblir, agreafel)
description:
PROJECT BOUNCE (Dev Build)

Build up momentum and height to watch the score soar. Defeating all blue enemies or running out of time ends the round.

A game by agreafel and worblir.

Controls

Keyboard

WASD - Move

SPACEBAR - Jump

MOUSE - Move camera

LEFT SHIFT - Hold to enter slow motion mode

~ - Toggle pause menu

Gamepad (Based on Xbox Controller layout)

(UI must be navigated with mouse as of right now)

LEFT STICK - Move

A button - Jump

RIGHT STICK - Move camera

LEFT OR RIGHT BUMPER - Hold to enter slow motion mode

Start - Toggle pause menu

Credits
